title: Hokuto no Ken Zero: Kenshirou Den
synopsis: Last of the Shin Kyuuseishu Densetsu pentalogy. A prequel set between Kenshiro's defeat at the hands of Shin and the beginning of the manga.
voices: ['Abe, Hiroshi', 'Kirimoto, Takuya', 'Ishida, Yuriko', 'Otsuka, Chikao', 'Kanemitsu, Nobuaki', 'Inada, Tetsu', 'Koyama, Rikiya']
